2
T
----
type{id: 0, type: T[]@"int"}; {T[type[]]: T[]}
  type_i{id: I[type[]]@0, type: T[type[]]@"int"}; {I[type[], type_i[or(1), and(0)]]: I[type[]]}
    int_lit{id: I[type[], type_i[or(1), and(0)]]@0, location: span{from: pos{idx: I[type[], type_i[or(1), and(0)]]@0}, to: pos{idx: 1}}, val: 2}
CHILD PATHS
T[]

let x = 2 in x
T
----
